name: Coffin Drop (Cole Dunham)
description:
Your job is to bury people. The problem is that they keep coming back to life. See how long you can survive this tenuous, tedious job. Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 48

Controls:

WASD/Arrows to move

Left or right shift to sprint

E or Middle mouse to pick up items

Left mouse to use an item when equipped

Hold right mouse to charge up and throw items

Additional Information:

Digging spots are at the bottom of the map

Dig holes with the shovel

Put coffins in those holes

Use the shovel again to fill the graves

Coffins spawn at the top of the screen

Coffins will resurrect as zombies

Buried coffins resurrect slower

You lose if your player loses all of their health or if the coffin queue at the top of the screen is full

Your objective: Survive

*4/27/2021 - Fixed bug with highlighting graves that can be interacted with
